item.title:
Robert Pattinson’s upcoming projects:
• ‘Mickey17’ dir. Bong Joon-ho (March 2024)
• ‘The Batman - Part II’ dir. Matt Reeves (October 2025)
• ‘Average Height, Average Build’ dir. Adam McKay (TBD)
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Robert Downey Jr. will play a retired cop opposite Robert Pattinson’s serial killer in Adam McKay’s ‘AVERAGE HEIGHT, AVERAGE BUILD.’
The cop won’t give up on the murders despite his retirement, and the killer tries to prevent him from following his trail.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Netflix has acquired Adam McKay’s AVERAGE HEIGHT, AVERAGE BUILD starring Robert Pattinson, Amy Adams, Danielle Deadwyler, Robert Downey Jr & Forest Whitaker.
It follows a serial killer who gets into politics to change the laws to be more murder-friendly.
https://deadline.com/2023/04/netflix-adam-mckays-average-height-average-build-1235351284/…
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
Nida Manzoor’s ‘POLITE SOCIETY’ starring Priya Kansara and Ritu Arya is now playing in theaters.
The film holds a Rotten Tomatoes score of 91%.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: ‘CITADEL’ starring Priyanka Chopra Jonas and Richard Madden is the #1 series on Prime Video worldwide.
item.author: FilmUpdates
